[[File:Šárka Škorpíková - Walls of the Sun.jpg|thumb|''Walls of the Sun'' by [[:Category:Images by Šárka Škorpíková|Šárka Škorpíková]]]]

The '''Walls of the Sun''' or '''Mountains of the Sun''' was a great, curve-shaped mountain range in the [[Land of the Sun]], in the far East of [[Arda]]. It corresponded symmetrically to the mountain range [[Pelóri]] on the land of [[Aman]], but not as tall.<ref>{{SM|5b}}</ref>

== Other versions of the legendarium ==
In earlier writings, a great mountain [[Kalormë]] was in the Land, which seemed to correspond to the [[Oiolossë]] in the [[Aman]]<ref name="LT1">{{LT1|IX}}, pp. 212, 225</ref> although it is not specified in a mountain range.
